bug.author: unnonouno
bug.summary: `concat` with the last axis fails on py3
bug.description:
Same problem in as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/issues/253>#253</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ShigekiKarita>@ShigekiKarita</denchmark-link> reported this problem too. Thanks! <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/ShigekiKarita/4293f886765a1ed4a144>https://gist.github.com/ShigekiKarita/4293f886765a1ed4a144</denchmark-link>
